CurrenciesList
Class for currency validation before fetching data from API
CurrencyActivity
Class to implement Currency Converter logics let user input currency info, amount to convert to retrieve converted amount from app Also, user can save and retrieve record from previous conversions
CurrencyDetailsFragment
Class to implement fragment layout to display individual transaction details
CurrencyTransaction
Class to establish variables for Currency Converter Module to be stored in database
CurrencyTransactionDAO
Interface to establish sql statements to be implemented in corresponding java methods or collections establish database access object through this interface
CurrencyTransactionDatabase
an abstract class to establish database to store transactions from currency conversion
MainActivity
Class to load launching page of the app
TriviaActivity
The TriviaActivity class represents the main activity for the Trivia Quiz application.
TriviaDetailsFragment
A fragment that displays the details of a TriviaScore object.
TriviaFragmentBinding
 
TriviaHighScoresActivity
An activity that displays the top 10 high scores in a RecyclerView.
TriviaHighScoresAdapter
An adapter class for displaying a list of TriviaScores in a RecyclerView.
TriviaHighScoresAdapter.OnItemClickListener
 
TriviaItemScoreBinding
 
TriviaScore
This class represents a data model for storing Trivia scores in a database using Room.
TriviaScoreDatabaseHelper
This class serves as a helper for managing the Trivia scores database using SQLite.
